title: Fishing with Grandpa
description: Fishing with Grandpa tells the story of a grandfather and grandchild who go on a fishing trip together. The day's events are described from beginning to end, including baiting the hook and eating the fish. Young readers who have not been fishing just might get "hooked."
meta: boat, fish, hook, lake, pole, worms
